method.text: Take half the melon and cut into 8 equal slices. Take the other half and, using a melon bailer, scoop out 12 melon balls.
Cut each slice of Parma ham in 2 then, fanning them out, arrange 2 melon-slices along with 3 slices of the Parma ham on each serving plate with 3 melon balls on each.
Divide the tomato wedges between the plates, sprinkle each with pepper. Chill well. Garnish with mint.
